text: The men's javelin throw event at the 1982 Commonwealth Games was held on 9 October at the QE II Stadium in Brisbane, Australia. It was the last time that the old model javelin was used at the Games. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style=" text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Name !!
